post.body: Let it go Tamz, let it go. Proof again that books kick movies' ass.
Heppie, heppie!
I will be in the office. Call it working if you will.
Hi gorgeous. Cricket was awesome, wasn't it!
You certainly are!
It is the karmic antithesis of the tiara of fabulousness.
Linky-linky-linky
Hmm. No more deckchairs to rearrange. What now?
Woke up to a three uneaten snackwiches and a bath full of cold water. What happens after I go to bed?
Ha ha ha! http://internetno.ytmnd.com/
Hello world. Here's my localised wrapped tweet: http://tweetwrappr.com/SN83R
Come back, Goldfinger, all is forgiven.
Parking right outside the door. Gotta love holidays.
Putting words in straight lines...satisfying.
The sweet sound of bickering children. Well, at least they're not arguing with me.
The pig of shame to Meagan for: Who is Edward Cullen?
The home of lost widgets.
Tea, bath, oats, Twitter.
I did so fill in my leave form.
Lunchtime. Hmm...beans.
